snippet.textDisplay: It's too bad Wild Arms 4 and 5 are not available on the PS Store like the first three (yes, I liked 4). This game was especially hard to find and came out at the end of the PS2 cycle so most people missed on what is an awesome western JRPG. I'm still hoping that someday, somehow, we get a Wild Arms 6.
snippet.textOriginal: It's too bad Wild Arms 4 and 5 are not available on the PS Store like the first three (yes, I liked 4). This game was especially hard to find and came out at the end of the PS2 cycle so most people missed on what is an awesome western JRPG. I'm still hoping that someday, somehow, we get a Wild Arms 6.

snippet.textDisplay: @allthatishere Media.Vision still exists, but the people who made the first four WA are no longer there.
snippet.textOriginal: @allthatishere Media.Vision still exists, but the people who made the first four WA are no longer there.

snippet.textDisplay: @Joey Ford Oh, well I'm glad their still around tho. They had a hand in making my childhood something special.
snippet.textOriginal: @Joey Ford Oh, well I'm glad their still around tho. They had a hand in making my childhood something special.

snippet.textDisplay: @allthatishere Oh yeah, Media.Vision are still around to this day, they made the Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth games and also involved with the Valkyria Chronicles series. The problem is that Sony owns the IP of Wild Arms and they're too busy making games mostly made by westerns and focuses on censorship.
snippet.textOriginal: @allthatishere Oh yeah, Media.Vision are still around to this day, they made the Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth games and also involved with the Valkyria Chronicles series. The problem is that Sony owns the IP of Wild Arms and they're too busy making games mostly made by westerns and focuses on censorship.

snippet.textDisplay: Man I really want a 6th one also. I've played 1-3 so many times it's crazy, and I've played 4 a couple of times also, I liked it a lot. 5 is the only one I haven't played, but I would still absolutely love a 6th Wild Arms game.

snippet.textDisplay: SupraDarky I have to say, Supra, thanks for turning me on to this series and its great OSTs. Not having grown up with a PS1, I was not even aware it existed. Can’t wait to finally play one and see what they’re all about!
snippet.textOriginal: SupraDarky I have to say, Supra, thanks for turning me on to this series and its great OSTs. Not having grown up with a PS1, I was not even aware it existed. Can’t wait to finally play one and see what they’re all about!

snippet.textDisplay: For some reason 4 is the one I still have trouble finding. For all the odd choices and design flaws that came with this game, I still had a great time with it, and it goes without saying that the soundtrack is fantastic. Thanks for introducing me to the series.
